Subject: Suspicious car
Description: There is a suspicious car standing here. It looks very suspicious.

Subject: Youth in park
Description: This is a hotspot for youth hanging out in the park. They often scare people and their dogs by throwing stuff at them.  If you have time, please drive by if there are any people causing trouble.

Subject: Neighbour fight
Description: Last week there has been a fight here between the neighbours at number 3-4. Be aware of the tensions in the neighbourhood.

Subject: Event
Description: Running competition through Heerlen. The start/finish are at the Apollolaan

Subject: Theft
Description: Theft in Kruidvat Heerlen. 30-year old woman has stolen some small goods.

Subject: Open fine
Description: 200 meters from now there is a house with an open fine. The fine is on name of ... and consists of €2000.

Subject: New inhabitant POI
Description: A POI from .. Registered at this address last week. Name: Pietje van Dijk. Last month he was released after serving 5 years in prison for an armed assault.

Subject: Location ban
Description: Bart Huissen has a location ban in this swimming pool and 200 meters around it. Tick here to see his profile and picture.

Subject: Traffic accident
Description: There has been a traffic accident at the Geerstraat. A car crashed into a bike.

Subject: Hotspot for bike thefts
Description: The last few weeks multiple bikes have been stolen around this area. Be aware of bike thieves.

Subject: Vandalism
Description: Two persons put fireworks in the letter box of one of the neighbours and ran away. The inhabitant called and is worried they will come back to do more damage.
